pathways.description: Structural configuration related to this pathway encompasses the realization, in the time horizon considered (2020-2059), of Mhuanda Nkuwa reservoir and power plant in 2020, of Devil’s Gorge reservoir and power plant in 2022 while it does not include the realization of Batoka . This specific pathway has been selected with the following filtering sequence during the screening exercise in NSL 2019: Environment, Food, Cost.
pathways.name: P1

pathways.description: Structural configuration related to this pathway encompasses the realization, in the time horizon considered (2020-2059), of Mhuanda Nkuwa and Batoka reservoirs and power plants in 2020, and of Devil’s Gorge reservoir and power plant in 2045. This specific pathway has been selected with the following filtering sequence during the screening exercise in NSL 2019: Energy, Cost.
pathways.name: P2

pathways.description: Structural configuration related to this pathway encompasses the realization, in the time horizon considered (2020-2059), of Mhuanda Nkuwa and Batoka reservoirs and power plants in 2020, and of Devil’s Gorge reservoir and power plant in 2055. This specific pathway has been selected with the following filtering sequence during the screening exercise in NSL 2019: Cost, Food, Energy. Interestingly, the same pathway have been singled out also using another filtering sequence: Cost, Environment, Energy
pathways.name: P3

pathways.description: Structural configuration related to this pathway encompasses the realization, in the time horizon considered (2020-2059), of Mhuanda Nkuwa and Batoka reservoirs and power plants in 2020, and of Devil’s Gorge reservoir and power plant in 2045. This specific pathway has been selected with the following filtering sequence during the screening exercise in NSL 2019: Cost, Environment, Food.
pathways.name: P4

pathways.description: Structural configuration related to this pathway encompasses the realization, in the time horizon considered (2020-2059), of Mhuanda Nkuwa and Batoka reservoirs and power plants in 2020, and of Devil’s Gorge reservoir and power plant in 2040. This specific pathway has been selected with the following filtering sequence during the screening exercise in NSL 2019: Food, Energy, Cost.
pathways.name: P5

pathways.description: Structural configuration related to this pathway encompasses the realization, in the time horizon considered (2020-2059), of Batoka reservoir and power plant in 2020, of Mhuanda Nkuwa in 2035 and of Devil’s Gorge in 2055. This specific pathway has been selected with the following filtering sequence during the screening exercise in NSL 2019: Cost, Energy.
pathways.name: P6

pathways.description: Structural configuration related to this pathway encompasses the realization, in the time horizon considered (2020-2059), of Mhuanda Nkuwa and Batoka reservoirs and power plants in 2020, and of Devil’s Gorge in 2035. This specific pathway has been selected with the following filtering sequence during the screening exercise in NSL 2019: Energy, Cost.
pathways.name: P7
